sqlMap.sql:
select
,row_number() over (order by $preferredOrder$order by ROWNUM) ROW_NUM from TW_INV

update.dynamic:
/* SqlMap-TwInv.UpdateByCondition */
DSC_ID = #domain.dscId#
SHIPPER_CD = #domain.shipperCd#
CONSIGNEE_CD = #domain.consigneeCd#
SHIP_TO_CD = #domain.shipToCd#
SHIP_TO_COMP_CD = #domain.shipToCompCd#
CUSTOMER_CD = #domain.customerCd#
LGCY_SHIP_TO = #domain.lgcyShipTo#
PRICE_TERMS = #domain.priceTerms#
TRADE_TERMS = #domain.tradeTerms#
TERMS_POINT = #domain.termsPoint#
FREIGHT_RESPONSIBLE_CD = #domain.freightResponsibleCd#
PAY_TERMS = #domain.payTerms#
PAY_METH = #domain.payMeth#
TRNS_CD = #domain.trnsCd#
TRNS_CD_ORG = #domain.trnsCdOrg#
INVOICE_KEY = #domain.invoiceKey#
INVOICE_CTGRY = #domain.invoiceCtgry#
CONTAINER_SORTING_KEY = #domain.containerSortingKey#
CONTAINER_LOOSE_TYP = #domain.containerLooseTyp#
CUSTOM_TIMING_TYP = #domain.customTimingTyp#
CML_TYP = #domain.cmlTyp#
CURR_CD = #domain.currCd#
RE_EXP_GOODS_FLG = #domain.reExpGoodsFlg#
SHIPPED_DT = #domain.shippedDt#
SUPPLIER_INVOICE_NO = #domain.supplierInvoiceNo#
IMP_INVOICE_NO_1 = #domain.impInvoiceNo1#
IMP_INVOICE_NO_2 = #domain.impInvoiceNo2#
MIGRATION_FLG = #domain.migrationFlg#
GRP_NO_1 = #domain.grpNo1#
GRP_NO_2 = #domain.grpNo2#
DECISION_FLG = #domain.decisionFlg#
TEMP_INVOICE_NO = #domain.tempInvoiceNo#
INVOICE_NO = #domain.invoiceNo#
RE_INVOICE_FLG = #domain.reInvoiceFlg#
RE_INVOICE_SHIPPER_CD = #domain.reInvoiceShipperCd#
SALES_CONTRACT_FLG = #domain.salesContractFlg#
COM_UPDATE_FUNC_ID = #domain.comUpdateFuncId#
COM_UPDATE_USER_ID = #domain.comUpdateUserId#
COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE
